description: This file is a PHP-based web page that renders a user interface for configuring RIP routing settings on a network device. It includes PHP code to fetch existing configuration data, JavaScript code for dynamic UI interactions and validation, and HTML markup for form layout and styling.

methods.name: initPopulate
methods.description: Initializes form fields with current RIP configuration data retrieved via PHP.

methods.name: initEventHandler
methods.description: Sets initial enabled/disabled state for authentication key and ID inputs based on selected authentication type.

methods.name: saveRIP
methods.description: Sends updated RIP configuration data to the server via AJAX to be stored.
